compatibility.notes: The HPND-Fenneberg-Livingston license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions.

key_requirements: Retain copyright notice in all copies.
Include permission notice in all copies.
Do not use the author's name for promotion without permission.
license.name: HPND-Fenneberg-Livingston
obligations: Include the copyright and permission notice in all copies and supporting documentation.
Do not use the name of Lars Fenneberg in advertising or publicity without specific prior permission.
Provide notice in supporting documentation that copying and distribution is by permission of Lars Fenneberg.
